website_summaries.verdict: The rugged Olympus Tough TG-830 iHS isn't the company's top-end rugged, waterproof camera, but it's a solid choice for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought a previous model and this is far superior with regards to durability. This has endured great white shark diving in South Africa and Scuba diving in the Maldives. The quality of my pictures were phenomenal and I am by no means an expert. It has been dropped from wiat heigh onto concrete a few times but only suffered cosmetic damage. I love this thing
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm T Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic camera. I have used it snorkelling and it takes some great footage. I also like the high speed capture so you can play back in slow motion. It is nice and solid too. You don't have to worry about it getting covered in sand, just rinse it in water. The perfect holiday camera.
customer_reviews.author: JazzyJeff

customer_reviews.title: best camera so far...
customer_reviews.text: fairly lightweight, but feels the business. tough by name and so far it has not been dropped from a height or dropped in water or had to deal with temperatures below 0 degrees.. but the magic filter is the best set of filter options i have ever had on a camera.. we are thoroughly pleased with this..wish we had discovered it years ago.. would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: andrei

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and rugged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work I am doing in the Middle East where dust and sand are a real problem. I was looking for a rugged camera that was easy to use in a point and squirt fashion. This fits the bill. The picture quality is good and it is easy to handle. I have not dropped it yet! But it is so well made that I have no worries on that score if I am clumsy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. Gray

customer_reviews.title: ... had chance to rate it yet but will leave better feed back after my wife has used and tried ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for a Christmas present so have not had chance to rate it yet but will leave better feed back after my wife has used and tried it, but looks good and very pleased with the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: francis barry rafferty

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: takes great pics in & out of the water, no probs at all while snorkelling down to about 6m, have now purchased the 40m underwater housing to go diving with (won't even have to worry if it leaks a little) Could do with a wider angle lens but at this price its an excellent choice
customer_reviews.author: Stefano Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great delivery and I love the Camara, it looks good and is very solid and well made, I bought it for my Kayaking hobby and being waterproof was another reason for buying the Olympus Tough very pleased all round
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother...
customer_reviews.text: Faulty after a single trip. Sent off for repair came back faulty. Advise to stay away from Olympus.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Das

customer_reviews.title: Could not recommend more! Amazing camera!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this camera! I have 5 cameras at the moment but this has to be my favourite compact. The photo quality both under water and above water is fantastic. I love, love, love this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Got this as we were going diving in Egypt and wanted to take underwater photos. The camera is fairly easy to use underwater and we got some great shoots both in the sea and the swimming pool
customer_reviews.author: Tinabeana

customer_reviews.title: Some very strong plus points in build, quality and ...
customer_reviews.text: Some very strong plus points in build, quality and functionality.. Tough and portable but also fiddly to use and having limited zoom capability. HARD to rank higher than 'Ok' for me.
customer_reviews.author: jarrettie

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for over a year now and very pleased, good quality photo's, used it Scuba diving, the GPS is a good function, can recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results, but been very lazy and only used ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent results, but been very lazy and only used iAuto so far. Worth it just to watch the expression on peoples faces when I washed it off under the beach shower.
customer_reviews.author: the bazoid

customer_reviews.title: Very good but battery dose die pretty quick if left on ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good but battery dose die pretty quick if left on and the flap you have to open when charging is easier broken as I found out. Nice to hold and got some good setting.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D.

customer_reviews.title: Best camera out there
customer_reviews.text: Best camera out there, not only indestructible it looks fun and has amazing features and takes wonderful pictures for a small camera.
customer_reviews.author: S7

customer_reviews.title: TG-830 Great underwater
customer_reviews.text: A really versatile camera. Bought mainly for underwater use and worked well. The only minor niggle was when using underwater it was easy to press the zoom button accidentally. Would still give 5 stars as the pictures/video underwater were very good.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Woods

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Best camera I have ever had!! It has so many different features. Which provide hours of fun taking photos. Also the under water photos are incredible, they came out so clear. This is a really good quality camera, definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren McHoull

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera, surpassed expectations
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera, surpassed expectations. Took high quality images and easy to use with very good battery life, would not hesitate to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my daughters birthday who is doing open water diving in Asia and so far so good
customer_reviews.author: salam

customer_reviews.title: great action camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an 8 year old olympus camera which eventually packed up. I use this when kayaking and canoeing. It captures great pictures and videos. I really love being able to take stills while videoing. Its great when running rapids.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality great, very fast at taking photos so when snorkelling ...
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality great, very fast at taking photos so when snorkelling I rarely missed a shot because of shutter delay. Not too heavy for an under water camera, only down side is battery life is quite short I had to charge it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ponsford

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't have asked for a better product and service
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic camera that does more than I expected. I bought this camera because a friend of mine had one and I was so impressed with it i had to get one
customer_reviews.author: Graham Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Underwater camera that works
customer_reviews.text: Great camera when used despite murky water Used it for range of other photos also great quality images Worth having
customer_reviews.author: Mr A Melbourne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera. Takes great photos in and out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Takes great photos in and out of the water. Auto mode doesn't like to use the flash at night though so you have to remember to turn the flash on.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Thawley

customer_reviews.title: Great all round camera
customer_reviews.text: Great all round camara for underwater and normal shots. Loads of additional functionality and the build is solid. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: RiAz

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Clear photos and useful special effects settings but the camera is larger than many digital cameras. Very simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great compact .... essential travel companion
customer_reviews.text: Great compact camera that did it's job in Thailand in my usually monthly trip each year. Fell 20 steps from Big Buddha temple and gave quite a demonstration why it's called tough .. not even a small scratch. Underwater it does it's job efficiently ..absolutely no leaks .. clear images Magic effects are a bonus like dramatic effect or cinematic.. Video taking is exceptional...even underwater Good zoom ... all round if you need a great compact try this Olympus...take it everywhere on your trip
customer_reviews.author: Andre Malta

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera from Olympus
customer_reviews.text: Had an Olympus μ725SW from 2007 which needed replacing as focus mechanism not working. A friend recommended a cheaper version of the Olympus TOUGH but I wanted to upgrade. Saw the TG-830 and liked the features and style. Great to use so far in and out of the water - only wishes (so far) are that they provided a printed a better guide (even if basic) to help get me started (instead of having to download the manual from CD) and also the dial on the back (mode dial) could have been made a little bigger. Trying out all the functions could take me a while!
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera I have had for underwater, and for all other filming too.Just brilliant, beautiful clear photographs!
customer_reviews.author: :b kosan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a replacement to a leaky Pentax, it's an all round better camera. The battery and connection doors have a double lock mechanism which seem to be watertight. The Intelligent auto option works well, meaning no manual changes when going underwater and picture quality is generally good. The video is also impressive, much better than I have seen previously from a compact
customer_reviews.author: Mr. I. J. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camer
customer_reviews.text: Although I had to send one back to be repaired, as the corner of the screen began leaking after its second use in water, I do believe it was an isolated incident and have had no problems since. More importantly, the repair service was fantastic. Sent it off by free delivery, was returned within 10 days with a repair note. Good quality camera, lots of functions, picture quality is pretty good ( not as good as you can get but its still very good)
customer_reviews.author: Neil Reid

customer_reviews.title: Very good compact waterproof camera.
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof to 10 m. Good pictures. Easy to use. Robust. Lens does not extend or retract so quite quick from switch on to taking picture. Charges from micro USB so no dedicated charger needed. Switches a little fiddly as they need to be waterproof, but this is a very small price to pay. Quite thin so easy to put in pocket but heavy for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Super-dooper
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my chap`s birthday pressie - he loves this camera, and he is Quite Fussy about such things! It has (I think) image stabilising when snapping away - which makes pretty much all the pics good quality/ not blurry. But I can`t comment on technical stuff - read a more knowledgeable reviewer, or one who cares - as it was a gift, and the man is happy, that`s all I am able to comment upon. NB for `I love it` 5 star rating read `HE loves it` ...
customer_reviews.author: Lampgirl

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says on the Tin!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't really fault this camera the picture and video quality are good. The only thing that I was surprised at is that Olympus feel that they no longer need to have a lens cover for this, which means it's now alot easier to damage the lens than it used to be. As long as your fairly careful it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very tough and high quality.
customer_reviews.text: I took this camera backpacking and used it underwater many times with great results. With the right settings you can get some great photos so play around with it before you go away. The feature that allows you to take photos whilst filming works perfectly and takes very high quality photos exactly like the ones taken in normal settings. Honestly i think it is definitely worth the money if you are the outdoor adventure type.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Background noise spoils video.
customer_reviews.text: This camera was excellent in all respects but one. The video sound track had a continuous whirring dull clicking sound running in the background like an electric motor which is probably what it is. It is a great shame as I was really looking forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lynn Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: We bought this one and it broke the first time we took it into water.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this one and it broke the first time we took it into water. We subsequently bought a TG-2 which again leaked into the lens in less than 20cms of water. Two camera's, two failures, I just don't think the build quality is there. Maybe they should move the production back to Japan.
customer_reviews.author: Joel James

customer_reviews.title: awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: this camera rocks, works well in the conditions we subjected it to, underwater snow ice, hot days cold days , absolutely love it. I even brought a second one for myself..
customer_reviews.author: aden

customer_reviews.title: This camera exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Excellent photo's and superb quality video, the camera exceeded my expectations. It has some great features which I'm sure I'll get around to checking out. What's more, it really does work well underwater, if only I could improve the water visibility and keep the turtles still!
customer_reviews.author: D A Frampton

customer_reviews.title: Works underwater as described
customer_reviews.text: The button which takes photos seems a little sticky though, going to give it a bit more of a field test before I moan.
customer_reviews.author: peteski22

customer_reviews.title: Olympus Stylus Tough TG 830
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Camera, looks good quality, havent used it yet, going to Cebu, where i will be seeing the Whale Sharks in March, will update when i get back.
customer_reviews.author: Alan James Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: We had a Olympus tough before and upgraded to this one due to a theft. Very simple to use, excellent pics, used in the sea with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Digory

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bit of kit, took it ice climbing and up Mont Blanc and perfect pictures every time. Would recommend it to anyone who doesn't want to worry about knocks and scrapes.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service from Carmarthen Cameras, but the camera itself is bad
customer_reviews.text: A real shame - great service from the supplier but the camera has an inherent design fault. I purchased this to have a camera that could put up with being dropped etc and also not be ruined from sticky fingers on the lens from our young daughter. As a diver's camera this would probably be great - but movie mode above water is virtually useless due to the constant clicking sound (I assume this is the autofocus). Had to send it back, Olympus really need to overcome this problem Other than that, the camera takes great pictures in relatively low light conditions and everything else seems fine
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Philip Booker

customer_reviews.title: Olympus Tough
customer_reviews.text: The camera is fantastic. Very easy to use and does what it says on the tin. However the soft ware is a NIGHTMARE !!. This is my third Olympus camera which I use daily for work. The software is extremely complicated and NOT user friendly. The process of extracting pictures to pre selected files is tricky. No way as easy as previous models - be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Branston

customer_reviews.title: it is brilliant camera! we did use it on our honeymoon and the pictures looks so professional.highly recommend for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: brilliant camera! light ,pictures from our honeymoon look so professional ! i would highly recommend for anyone! great camera ! light,easy to use! everyone feels jealous of image quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Misiak

customer_reviews.title: Olympus Tough
customer_reviews.text: Over the last ten years I have had three Olympus Tough cameras. They are incredibly hardy and take brilliant photos. The camera was delivered on time and is in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Oos

customer_reviews.title: FOGGYING
customer_reviews.text: Problem that occurs in my camera:LENS and LCD DISPLAY-PAIRING. I took it to Mexico and it started pairing, every time when i was on the beach or in the water. The camera does not lay in the sun, was hidden in a backpack, before has been used.
customer_reviews.author: kamcillo

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars59 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
